title: 【冷子の灌水】最近迷上了洛天依
author: zzx2005
txt_content:
——MCBBS最有潜力的：
   红（zui）石（you）命（qian）令（li）设（de）计（shui）师（jun）[偶尔答疑&经常水贴][最爱经验&水上屠龙][热爱Minecraft&专业生存]
                                                    Zzx2005

标题: 【冷子の灌水】最近迷上了洛天依最近迷上了洛天依2333 无法自拔 导致情诗只字未写，我要开始写情诗了
现在情诗一稿已经差不多了

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
大爱初音 从未改变





"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."

replies.txt_content: 说白了就是以洛天依为基准写诗嘛~
